title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Israel has approved a settlement project that could divide the West Bank

items.title: The kids missing the most amount of school may surprise you: kindergartners
items.description: A California school district fights chronic absenteeism in kindergarten by helping parents decide whether their kid is too sick to go to school.

items.title: Bolsonaro planned to flee to Argentina, Brazil police say
items.description: Police say they found a letter on the former Brazilian president's phone requesting asylum in Argentina.

items.title: Three more species of giraffe than previously thought - can you spot the difference?
items.description: Giraffes have always been thought to be one species, but scientists now say there are four.

items.title: Russia launches biggest wave of strikes on Ukraine for weeks
items.description: Ukrainian officials say the attacks included drones, hypersonic, ballistic, and cruise missiles.

items.title: Serena Williams reveals she's using weight loss drugs and addresses stigma
items.description: Tennis legend Serena Williams is sharing her journey with weight loss drugs, saying she's lost 31 pounds in 8 months using GLP-1s.

items.title: Ukraine says huge Russian attack proves Putin uninterested in peace
items.description: As Trump pushes for peace, Ukraine accuses Russia of a deadly drone and missile strike, "as if there were no efforts by the world to stop this war."

items.title: U.S. and EU flesh out trade commitments under new framework deal
